main event: A civilian family, including a man, his wife, and two children, observed a disc-like object hovering at tree-top level for about 10 minutes in Phoenix, Arizona.
interesting points: The object was described as about 10 feet in diameter,It hovered silently before rapidly ascending and disappearing,The sightings were observed from their home and included bright lights in the sky,One of the witnesses had a history of similar sightings,The weather conditions during the sightings were reported as clear with good visibility.
sighted object: a disc-like object with bright lights
witness description: civilian family including a man, his wife, and two children
